settings.label: Widgets below copied as reference from Laptop layout.  Any changes made to the widget configurations in the 'md' and 'sm' layouts will be synchronized.

Widgets A and B have been copied as references below. While their card positions and dimensions have been modified, their content remains unchanged. Any changes made to the widget configurations in the 'default', 'xl', or 'lg' layouts will be synchronized.

config.title: Widget A and B combined: sin(x) + cos(x) on the same chart

settings.label: The two chart widgets no longer fit well on the screen, so we combined them into a single, entirely new widget. Changes made to the charts in the 'Default', 'xl', or 'lg' layouts will no longer affect this new chart.

Widgets A and B have been copied as references below. While their card positions and dimensions have been modified, their content remains unchanged. Any changes made to the widget configurations in the 'default', 'xl', or 'lg' layouts will be synchronized.
The two chart widgets no longer fit well on the screen, so we replaced them with the cards, entirely new widgets. Changes made to the charts in other layouts will no longer affect these cards.
